channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-41366|2024-08-02T19:01:35.309Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: Under certain condition SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP - versions KERNEL 722, KERNEL 7.53, KERNEL 7.77, KERNEL 7.85, KERNEL 7.89, KERNEL 7.54, KERNEL 7.91, KERNEL 7.92, KERNEL 7.93, KERNEL 7.94, KERNEL64UC 7.22, KERNEL64UC 7.22EXT, KERNEL64UC 7.53, KERNEL64NUC 7.22, KERNEL64NUC 7.22EXT, allows an unauthenticated attacker to access the unintended data due to the lack of restrictions applied which may lead to low impact in confidentiality and no impact on the integrity and availability of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-32733|2024-06-04T17:50:43.945Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: Due to missing input validation and output encoding of untrusted data, SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform allows an unauthenticated attacker to inject malicious JavaScript code into the dynamically crafted web page. On successful exploitation the attacker can access or modify sensitive information with no impact on availability of the application

item.title: CVE-2024-33006|2024-06-04T17:44:12.903Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can upload a malicious file to the server which when accessed by a victim can allow an attacker to completely compromise system.

item.title: CVE-2024-32733|2024-08-02T02:20:35.550Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: Due to missing input validation and output encoding of untrusted data, SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP and ABAP Platform allows an unauthenticated attacker to inject malicious JavaScript code into the dynamically crafted web page. On successful exploitation the attacker can access or modify sensitive information with no impact on availability of the application

item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can upload a malicious file to the server which when accessed by a victim can allow an attacker to completely compromise system.
